channel.title: Devolution-X: Building Entertainment
channel.description:
[i][b]Devolution-X[/b][/i] ‹ Building Entertainment
[b]Behind the Scenes:[/b] Well, basically to make a long story short there were a couple of people who wanted to start a great server. Now, don't get me wrong this isn't finished or anywhere near that however it does contain potential. The fact that we are hard working, dedicated and unique coders is where this shines. Our staff, which is small in numbers but talented in their own ways are listed below:
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/snz348.gif[/img] [u]Killamess[/u]: Lead Programmer/Owner [u]David:[/u]: Hoster/Website Design [u]Rog3r:[/u]: Programmer
[b]Features:[/b]
[code] Perfect Weapon Animations Packet 53 holds mostly arrays Deleted many of the old useless Devolution v7 methods Added Event Manager 2 Full Quests 1 v 1 Pking (PVP) Unique Quest Point Rewards Full Herblore Cleaning Special Attacks and also no unwanted sidebars unique! Fixed object1 methods Added a class for adding objects globally using new ways Teleother Full GFX on Ranging Deleted most commands and replaced with newer ones + new class NPC Facing during spawning Arena Spells Full Teleporting (Gfx and all) Advanced Dialogue System Full Pickpocketing Fixed Many Dupes (Also fixed a couple that were never released) NPC Health bar fix Fixed Repetitive animations Perfect Pickup Full Food Eating with new methods Support for ALL bows Fixed Object1 & Object2 distance issues Full Bank Rearranging Fixed some methods that needed some switch statements Unique Yell that requires a wait timer Full Magic GFX Full Caskets that will be used later Team Pking Full Bone Burying Unique Quest System - Really, there is more but can't be arsed to post more[/code]
[b]Some Extra Information:[/b]
Our goal is to make it as fun as possible. We also have some performance upgrades which will run the server very smoothly. First off, we have a VPS which is at premium level. Next off we have a very small process in our client class. We'd also like to have as many quests as possible, and a very great Pking stand point. Hey, even I like to player kill.
[i]Video of a quest being built:[/i] [url=http://ca.youtube.com/watch?v=Dl9xc05nqtI]http://ca.youtube.com/watch?v=Dl9xc05nqtI[/url] Note: NPC's will most likely be more far apart
[i]Video of combat in Devolution-X:[/i] [url=http://nz.youtube.com/watch?v=1ikfswcX4-g]http://nz.youtube.com/watch?v=1ikfswcX4-g[/url]
I'd have pictures, but until we have more things done with the server, there won't be any. I'll also update it time to time so you guys can get a feeling of this development.
Oh yeah one more thing. Killamess tends to focus on the emotions, player killing and little bugs. He fixed up the weapon animations, made Pking so amazing I couldn't even believe it. The only thing he has to add now to get it almost perfect, is special attacks without the unwanted bar. We'll make it our own so we won't be using any quests.
Till' then, bye!

item.title: Devolution-X: Building Entertainment
item.dc:creator: @Devolution-X Devolution-X
item.description:
@Devolution-X wrote:

Devolution-X
‹ Building Entertainment

Behind the Scenes: Well, basically to make a long story short there were a couple of people who wanted to start a great server. Now, don’t get me wrong this isn’t finished or anywhere near that however it does contain potential. The fact that we are hard working, dedicated and unique coders is where this shines. Our staff, which is small in numbers but talented in their own ways are listed below:


Killamess: Lead Programmer/Owner
David:: Hoster/Website Design
Rog3r:: Programmer

Features:

[code]
Perfect Weapon Animations
Packet 53 holds mostly arrays
Deleted many of the old useless Devolution v7 methods
Added Event Manager
2 Full Quests
1 v 1 Pking (PVP)
Unique Quest Point Rewards
Full Herblore Cleaning
Special Attacks and also no unwanted sidebars unique!
Fixed object1 methods
Added a class for adding objects globally using new ways
Teleother
Full GFX on Ranging
Deleted most commands and replaced with newer ones + new class
NPC Facing during spawning
Arena Spells
Full Teleporting (Gfx and all)
Advanced Dialogue System
Full Pickpocketing
Fixed Many Dupes (Also fixed a couple that were never released)
NPC Health bar fix
Fixed Repetitive animations
Perfect Pickup
Full Food Eating with new methods
Support for ALL bows
Fixed Object1 & Object2 distance issues
Full Bank Rearranging
Fixed some methods that needed some switch statements
Unique Yell that requires a wait timer
Full Magic GFX
Full Caskets that will be used later
Team Pking
Full Bone Burying
Unique Quest System

  • Really, there is more but can’t be arsed to post more[/code]

Some Extra Information:

Our goal is to make it as fun as possible. We also have some performance upgrades which will run the server very smoothly. First off, we have a VPS which is at premium level. Next off we have a very small process in our client class. We’d also like to have as many quests as possible, and a very great Pking stand point. Hey, even I like to player kill.

Video of a quest being built: http://ca.youtube.com/watch?v=Dl9xc05nqtI
Note: NPC’s will most likely be more far apart

Video of combat in Devolution-X: http://nz.youtube.com/watch?v=1ikfswcX4-g

I’d have pictures, but until we have more things done with the server, there won’t be any. I’ll also update it time to time so you guys can get a feeling of this development.

Oh yeah one more thing. Killamess tends to focus on the emotions, player killing and little bugs. He fixed up the weapon animations, made Pking so amazing I couldn’t even believe it. The only thing he has to add now to get it almost perfect, is special attacks without the unwanted bar. We’ll make it our own so we won’t be using any quests.

Till’ then, bye!

Read full topic
